show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
What is one of the main causes for chronic disease that usually goes unnoticed? <!--more--> How well does ibuprofen and Tylenol work for colds and flus?
What do gut microbes have to do with the development of colon cancer?
What is as important as insulin in regulating blood sugar levels?
Why is medical tourism a growing business?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips are: The wife from hell What Confucius didn’t say
